title: Smart Data Models - ExcREXS
description: Adapted from CIM data models. General Purpose Rotating Excitation System Model.  This model can be used to represent a wide range of excitation systems whose DC power source is an AC or DC generator. It encompasses IEEE type AC1, AC2, DC1, and DC2 excitation system models.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcREXS

e1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Field voltage value 1 (E1).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0.0

e2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Field voltage value 2 (E2).  Typical Value = 4. Default: 0.0

fbf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rate feedback signal flag (Fbf). Typical Value = fieldCurrent. Default: None

flimf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Limit type flag (Flimf).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rectifier regulation factor (Kc).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

kd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter regulation factor (Kd).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

ke.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter field proportional constant (Ke).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kefd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Field voltage feedback gain (Kefd).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rate feedback gain (Kf).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0

kh.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Field voltage controller feedback gain (Kh).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kii.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Field Current Regulator Integral Gain (Kii).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kip.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Field Current Regulator Proportional Gain (Kip).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

ks.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Coefficient to allow different usage of the model-speed coefficient (Ks).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kvi.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage Regulator Integral Gain (Kvi).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kvp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage Regulator Proportional Gain (Kvp).  Typical Value = 2800. Default: 0.0

kvphz.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. V/Hz limiter gain (Kvphz).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

nvphz.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pickup speed of V/Hz limiter (Nvphz).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

se1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Saturation factor at E1 (Se1).  Typical Value = 0.0001. Default: 0.0

se2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Saturation factor at E2 (Se2).  Typical Value = 0.001. Default: 0.0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage Regulator time constant (Ta).  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0

tb1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lag time constant (Tb1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tb2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lag time constant (Tb2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tc1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead time constant (Tc1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tc2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead time constant (Tc2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter field time constant (Te).  Typical Value = 1.2. Default: 0

tf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rate feedback time constant (Tf).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

tf1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Feedback lead time constant (Tf1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tf2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Feedback lag time constant (Tf2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Field current Bridge time constant (Tp).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

vcmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum compounding voltage (Vcmax).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

vfmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum Exciter Field Current (Vfmax).  Typical Value = 47. Default: 0.0

vfmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum Exciter Field Current (Vfmin).  Typical Value = -20. Default: 0.0

vimax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage Regulator Input Limit (Vimax).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum controller output (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 47. Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum controller output (Vrmin).  Typical Value = -20. Default: 0.0

xc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter compounding reactance (Xc).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0
